dataset_information.missing_data: Some individuals born in the early 1970s had missing data on parents
dataset_information.data_cleaning: Data collected from registers for all individuals with a unique personal identity number in Sweden since 1947

usage_in_paper.specifics: Used to examine the intergenerational transmission of fertility patterns from grandparents and parents' siblings in contemporary Sweden

study_context.study_title: Multigenerational Transmission of Family Size in Contemporary Sweden

dependent_variables.name: Fertility patterns
dependent_variables.measurement: Association between completed fertility of grandparents and parents' siblings with fertility of index persons

control_variables.name: Completed fertility of parents, grandparents, aunts, and uncles
control_variables.measurement: Total number of children born in Sweden by the end of 2007
